title: Synthesis and characterization of non-ionic flame-retardant waterborne polyurethane

Hongping Tong, Weimin Wang, Gui Wang, Xiaojun Wang, Dongmei Yu, Bajin Chen, Kemei Pei
Waterborne polyurethane (WPU) offers many advantages and is widely used in coatings, leathers, adhesives, biomaterials, and other consumer products.
